name: players
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_golf_data.
Tool description: PGA Tour and LIV Tour live golf data for your application needs such as rankings, leaderboards, scorecards, and results.
API description: Fetch a PGA Tour player by his last name, first name, playerId, or a combination of these parameters.

You must provide at least one search parameter to the API.

lastname.description: The last name of the player. Default is 'Morikawa'.

playerid.description: The ID of the player. Default is '50525'.

firstname.description: The first name of the player. Default is 'Collin'.
